# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) facing DOWN
- Output chest at (15.5, 72.5)
- Connected to small electric pole at (17.5, 69.5)
- Currently not powered (status: NO_POWER)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5, 70.5) facing DOWN
- Output chest at (-46.5, 72.5) containing 10 copper ore
- Connected to small electric pole at (-44.5, 69.5)
- Currently working (status: WORKING)

### Water Supply System (Original)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) facing RIGHT
- Extensive pipe network extending from (-8.5, -0.5) to (30.5, 63.5)
- Currently working (status: WORKING) with water flowing

### New Power Plant at (-9.5, 9.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 9.5) facing RIGHT
- Boiler at (-6.0, 10.5) facing RIGHT (fuel: 45 coal)
- Steam engine at (-1.5, 10.5) facing RIGHT
- Connected pipe network:
  - Water pipes from (-8.5, 9.5) to boiler
  - Steam pipe at (-4.5, 10.5)
- Currently working (status: WORKING)

### Extended Water Pipe Network
- Original water pipe system still operational
- New water pipe segment added at (30.5, 63.5) containing 5998.52 units of water

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Distance Errors (Repeated)
- Attempted to place offshore pump at (-11.0, 80.0) while at (20.5, 80.5)
- Attempted to place boiler at (30.5, 65.5) while at (0, 0)
- Attempted to place boiler at (31.0, 65.5) while at (0, 0)
  - Always move within 10 tiles before placing entities
  - Verify player position relative to target position

### Fluid System Connection Issues
- Failed to connect boiler at (31.0, 65.5) to itself (invalid self-connection)
- Boiler at (-6.0, 10.5) shows NOT_CONNECTED status despite pipe connections
  - Verify connection points are properly aligned
  - Ensure fluid systems are properly initialized before connection attempts
  - Check for blocked connection points

### Entity Access Errors
- Attempted to access non-existent electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5)
  - Verify entity exists before accessing
  - Use proper entity detection methods before operations

### General Tips (Updated)
- When placing boilers, ensure proper clearance (3x2 tiles)
- Verify all power plant components are properly connected:
  - Offshore pump → pipes → boiler → steam engine
- For long-distance operations, move closer before placement attempts
- After placing entities, verify their connection status
- Clear areas completely before rebuilding systems
